On the territory of the complex there are: shopping galleries, a business center, an amusement park for children, a modern cinema, a multi-level parking lot for 800 cars and much more.\n Amenities: Public toilet; Free Wi-Fi\n Daily 10:00 - 22:00

Overlooking the Tien Shan mountains, this modern five-star hotel is located in the business district, a 3-minute walk from the Opera and Ballet Theater and 12 minutes from the Kyrgyz State historical museum.\n Check-in time: 14:00\n Check-out time: 12:00
Set in a residential area, this relaxed five-star hotel is 2 km from Asanbai Amusement Park, 8 km from Oak Park and 22 km from route A365.\n Check-in time: 14:00\n Check-out time: 12:00
Novotel Bishkek City Center located 28 km away from Manas International Airport and 2.2 km away from Ala Too square\n Check-in time: 15:00\n Check-out time: 12:00

Cozy and comfortable hotel "RIXON" is located on a quiet street of Bishkek, not far from the city center, which attracts tourists and fans of excursion programs.\n Check-in time: 15:00\n Check-out time: 12:00
